website_summaries.verdict: Extra bright bulbs with an extended, long-lasting life.
pros: Connectivity with automated vehicle systems like daytime running lights makes it work right from the start
Extra protections such as water resistance and a dust barrier keep the bulb working
cons: Output results vary depending on the particular bulb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights for Rav4
customer_reviews.text: Installed these for 2010 Toyota Rav4 and they look incredible! It was like channeling the sun through my headlights at night. I did have to adjust my headlights down to keep from blinding other drivers, but the lights themselves look great. While driving, I can't hear the fans going at all even though they are huge fans. With other LED headlights I've used, the fan housing seemed crap with restrictions in air flow to vent the heat, these had a huge opening in the back for the fan to circulate the air so I'm not worried about these lights at all. Installation took literally 5 minutes, they fit easily and feel snug and tight. Awesome lights and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought them twice
customer_reviews.text: I love these headlights. I first put them in my 2011 F150 and they made a world of a difference. I just put them in my 2005 Tahoe and they are amazing. I read that some people had to do a little trimming for the headlight to fit and that was true for me as well. I used my dremel to cut some plastic away for the headlight to fit properly on the drivers side. It was easy and doesn't effect how anything else fits. The passenger side fit perfectly without having to do any modifications.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: HUGE improvement over stock halogen
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 2002 Honda Accord VP. Initial opening: (Pros) •The packaging is very impressive. It rivals that of an iPhone packaging. •The construction of the LEDS leaves you feeling very confident. (Cons) •The Amazon website advertised them as a 60Watt LED, where as on the box they are actually a 30Watt LED. • It has the spot for colored sleeves but they were not in the boxing. It would be nice if they were supplied. Installation/Actual Use (Pros) •The LEDs are a huge improvement over the stock halogen bulbs. (Cons) •The LEDs were a little rough to get them into the assembly but after some persuasion they fit without any mods to the headlamp assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Flickers, don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: First off these are massive, if you don’t have a lot of room in the light housing area they might not fit. Second if you wanna see in the dark don’t buy these cause they flicker like the Vegas strip. They’re also super cheap, the 1/4 turn fittings are poorly made I had a lot of trouble getting them in place. Super disappointed especially cause I got 3 different types H11, 9006, 9005 from this brand and they all flickered on and off
customer_reviews.author: JaySutyak

customer_reviews.title: Fits 8th Gen Honda Civic without issue (2006-2011 models)
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2007 Honda Civic EX Coupe just fine. No code errors or technical issues with the product itself. No need to switch polarity on either install. The passenger side installation was very difficult although that's Honda's fault and not the product's. Very bright white light. If it lasts for 5,000 hours which is 1/10th of what they claim it can last, it will last well through the lifespan of almost any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: John Compton

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've used HID "kits" to get better lighting than stock halogens and have been happy with them, but they're fairly expensive and the ballast was not very small. These LED kits are a major improvement in terms of ease of installation. The ballasts are tiny and they're plug and play. These bulbs are very bright so make sure your headlights are aimed properly when using these to avoid blinding other drivers. I would've preferred a warmer color temperature closer to daylight but these are the only ones that this manufacturer offers. These are cool white like 6000K compared to my old HIDs which were 4200K.
customer_reviews.author: RYZEN

customer_reviews.title: THESE DO NOT WORK FOR A 2005 CHEVY!
customer_reviews.text: CRAP!!! Bought these for a 2005 Chevy Tahoe correct bulb number and everything. I go to put them in and they are plug and play no problem minus the fact that THEY DON'T SCREW IN TO A PROPER FIT! You would think when making a headlight they would take in to consideration how they fit in the housing. After almost an hour of trying to get them to screw in and stay in place I gave up and will be returning these. So disappointed really wanted them to work, guess I'll be sticking with my HIDs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp led's
customer_reviews.text: I would like to mention that approximately two years ago I bought another company led 9006's and they lasted a while and looked sharp. Then suddenly , they would shut down for a few seconds while driving . I bought these led headlights and they look very crisp down the road , more of a narrow beam and a few people can understand they're led headlights they think I have high beams on . So far love this company and only was maybe $5 more than the other company
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: 2015 Ram 1500
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs seem to be much brighter and a clearer white than factory halogens. These seem to be just like the other LED bulb brands on amazon as far as the quality of material of the bulbs. Make sure you do research on your vehicle before ordering as I know that with Ram trucks there is a flickering issue. You must also purchase error decoders with them, I am suppose to get the decoders from Cougar but I must wait because the order was in progress so now I have to wait twice as long to use them.. More to come when I get the decoders and night time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Alright so far
customer_reviews.text: So far these headlights seem great. Super bright and very white. They really light up the road. As other reviews state and even on the box these headlights come in, they tend to flicker (atleast with my 2006 Jeep Grand Cherokee) when they aren’t “on”. The box gives a contact email address and I tried to email the contact email on the box but apparently their inbox is full. It says to contact that email for flickering problems, I tried. So I’m trying here instead as well. Will update if the seller contacts me.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulbs but clearance issues.
customer_reviews.text: Selected this item, after inputting my 2006 Chevy Silverado 1500 info. When the bulbs came in the packaging was fine. I removed my head lights and installed the bulbs, but then I found that there is not enough clearance for bulbs due to there length of the bulb. The trucks head light mount does not allow the needed clearance.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect LED headlights
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging, installed them on my 2003 Tahoe Z71. Was easy to install once I found out the little trick. The adjustment screw you need to grab the thread with pliers an turn so the lower plastic tabs rotate 1/4 turn. Pull framing just enough to install new led light. Took about 10 min each side to install. Nice clean look. Bright 6000k look.
customer_reviews.author: Chad P

customer_reviews.title: Fitment issues but they are nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Lights are bright. They don’t fit my 2006 Grand Prix GT. I will have to cut holes in the headlight bracket to accommodate the lights heatsink/fan. The holesaw I bought is 1 3/4”. I will be drilling this out this week. I purchased the 9005s as those are the style for my high beams, those fit fine as there were holes in the headlight bracket. I can’t even slide the head light fully in with the low beams installed into the headlight. I’ll post pics after I drill the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my 95 Chevy Tahoe as a replacement for Sylvania Silver Star halogen lightbulbs. I have smoked headlight lenses so the brightness is reduced even with the Silver Star Halogen bulbs installed. Once I put these LED bulbs in, the difference was amazing. I can only imagine how much brighter they would be with clear lenses. I also have an LED light bar which I used to supplement the Halogen bulbs. These LEDs are so bright that my light bar is no longer needed. Very pleased and my money was well spent.
customer_reviews.author: ArmorPlate

customer_reviews.title: Great Headlights
customer_reviews.text: I first heard about them from Scotty Kilmer and while the price threw me off a little bit at first, as soon as I plugged them in you can these aren't your cousin's $5 ebay headlights. These are plug and play as all you do is connect the wire then screw the bulb in the headlight assembly. There's a lot of extra wire and while that's great, I wish they did a better job to tape off the part where the wires meet the connector. The only questions are whether or not these have sufficient longevity that the price point would suggest. I'll try to update along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing result
customer_reviews.text: MercedesW164 replacing halogen lamps . Disappointing result . These may claim to have many more lumens than a halogen lamp but the issue is how many of these lumens get into the beam where it’s needed. The LED unit is very bulky and reflector design is very critical , so a lot of lumens get sprayed everywhere- illuminating trees , night sky etc , instead of being accurately directed onto the road ahead. Also the after market stainless steel clips required to fit the LED unit into the reflector are woefully inadequate and much too flimsy- contributing further to the imprecise position of the LED “filaments. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Pinniger

customer_reviews.title: No joy.
customer_reviews.text: The light looks good and appears well built. That is where my positive experience ended. The locking ring on one light broke on first turn to install. Original light goes in with no problem. May have just been a bad locking ring. Your are not able to rotate the light inside the headlight to match the 3 and 9 o’clock as direct in instructions. So if your headlight assembly does not already sit in perfect position your out of luck. No instruction on how to resolve and no trouble shooting in instructions or website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. very bright! Good color. BUT... before buying I searched if it would fit my truck 2004 Silverado one post said yes. They do not fit mine without modifying the lights and the light bracket behind it. The depth of the fan doesn't allow it to fit! I modified both the lights and the lighting frame in order to make them fit! NOT recommended but I love the brightness and color!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lights, great luminosity
customer_reviews.text: The lights work well in my 2002 Honda the road is well lit. So much better than my old Halogens which burning out. The piece needed to have one of the tabs shaved off to fit in the light plug and it was a hard tight fit but I know they aren’t going anywhere so it was well worth it. Too short of time to say anything about longevity but I couldn’t be any happier with the product, definitely will look into for changing my brights next.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Cerney

customer_reviews.title: Replacements came fast.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first 2 years. They started to flicker here and there and now won't hardly light up. I've checked all wiring and everything is good, they're just going bad Update : Emma was wonderful and got the issue resolved. They sent me another set immediately and they're now installed and working again. Thank you for your excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Beatty Jr.

customer_reviews.title: 1999/2000 Chevy Crew Cab Dually
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1999/2000 chevy crew cab dually 7.4 LS body stile. My OEM headlights were so poor for illumanation I had to install LED running lights to help them. I looked and looked at LED headlights for a long time reading reviews and looking at prices. I decided on the Cougar LED bulbs and boy im glad I did. I am extremely happy with them they have improved my night driving experience 100 fold. They are bright white and fit my truck as good as the OEM bulbs. I have had them installed for two weeks now with out any issues whatsoever. Thank you for a good product and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Braydenj30

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I just installed these on my dad's car. Took me about 5 minutes to install. Was a little surprised it didn't have a ballast. Just a plug and that's it. I paid over $100 for some other LED headlights for my mom's car and those had a ballast which added to install time. As far as brightness goes, these are exactly the same amount of brightness as the $100+ LEDs on my mom's car. Now just to see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Turns Night into Day
customer_reviews.text: I now have Cougar Motors LED bulbs installed in 3 of our vehicles. They are easy to install, work beautifully, and last a very long time. The only thing some vehicle owners may need to think about is DRL (day running lights). The DRL on our Silverado works flawlessly with these LED bulbs, but the Saturn Vue needed the DRL fuse pulled to prevent the DRL from flashing (no big deal having the DRL disabled as it will just make the bulbs last longer). Will Definitely recommend and buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: SRsage

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive product to change up your headlights
customer_reviews.text: The LED headlights are awesome. With the help of my neighbor (which is the one that bought some and told me to get some) help me install them both no less than 15 minutes. We turned on the car and it was bright in the daytime. Last night, I truly seen what it does in the night. Leaving late from my job , I can see how the LED cut into the night. This is a great inexpensive product that can change the headlight game. The directions were straight on target.
customer_reviews.author: Big O

customer_reviews.title: Bad design plug
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to try these out but upon receiving them and checking them out before attempting installation I notice the plug/terminal looked different from what headlights normally have. the bulb end wouldn't even slide down inside of my vehicles wiring and I wasn't about to try and modify the LED bulb because once that was done they wouldn't be returnable. Is there a "true" and simple Plug & Play LED bulb out there???
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Bright Cool Light
customer_reviews.text: Brightness is good so far, and seems like a solid product. Longevity remains to be seen, as they are newly installed. Fairly straightforward install, except for driver's side low beam on my 2005 Chevy Tahoe. Had to trim (hack saw blade) some of the lamp mounting/adjustment housing to get install clearance for the rather tall bulb assembly (or remove the mount and have to realign bulbs, which I wasn't keen on doing). The passenger side low beam went in no problem. Both high beams had no clearance issues either.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright and no high beam
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my 2006 Honda Civic EX. Installation was easy. But first, the white light is not very bright especially at rainy night. There is no high beam. When you turn on the high beam, the light just got wider not higher. I bought it in 2007 and I am now looking for a replacement, maybe from a different brand. Update: I hate it more as I have it for a while long. I am now looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ma

customer_reviews.title: weak plastic retaining collar! Also burned out!
customer_reviews.text: Bright lights, but the retaining collar is thin plastic on these, one of them broke when Installing, now hoping to get a replacement, since they are under warranty! Will update with progress ****UPDATE***** Got replacement bulbs, one quit working within 6 months, debating trying warranty vs. buying diff brand.
customer_reviews.author: Yooper Trail

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the Cougar Motor led replacement bulbs for my 2013 International ProStar, 9006 The first thing I noticed was 1st class packaging. When I was installing them I was actually waiting for them to be a pain in the butt however I had them installed and working in under 5 minutes, on the first trip I was shocked how much better my view of the road was. Also these lights are bright however they are not obnoxiously bright to where they are blinding to other drivers. I highly recommend this product and will now update all of my fleets headlights to the Cougar Motor brand
customer_reviews.author: pitcowher

customer_reviews.title: OMG it's a miracle, I can see!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a low beam bulb burn out on my 2003 Mazda Miata SE, and decided that I wanted to replace them with LEDs for their much longer life span. No matter how much I cleaned the lenses or what bulbs I bought in the past I have always had a hard time seeing the road at night. After replacing them with these LED lights I can see every detail of the road at night. I should have dine this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Cosentino

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wifes car and they fit perfectly! She drives a 2012 Dodge Avenger, I was able to pull the old bulbs and swap them with these in about 20 minutes. It was a tight fit due to some plastic bracket right above where the bulb twists into the light fixture, but with a bit of contortionism, I was able to get them in and they are BRIGHT compared to Philips 9006 X-tremeVisions I bought for he a year ago. These came with everything needed to simply untwist the stock, unplug the cable, plug in these bulbs, twist them into light fixture. VERY happy with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug W

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright, but they don't fit well in my '95 M3's sockets. There doesn't appear to be any visible wiggling, however, so I'm sure the effect is the same. Would definitely recommend some eyelids or vinyl with these--the light goes quite high and would no doubt piss off anyone in front of you!
customer_reviews.author: AR Creative

customer_reviews.title: These didn't fit my 2006 Silverado
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a Kensun LED kit - it was much longer than the Cougar kit. I had to return the Kensun, and chose the Cougar kit because Amazon said that the Cougar would fit my vehicle. The Cougar kit - although shorter in length - did not fit in the headlight housing either. If you get these for your 2006 Silverado, be prepared to cut out a section of the headlight housing (2 inch X 2 inch) to accommodate the base of the LED lamp. PS - I used an oscillating tool to make the quick cuts!
customer_reviews.author: Salixmom

customer_reviews.title: They are bright but
customer_reviews.text: the focus is messed up. I have used them for 6 months approx before I sold my car. They are very bright but the reflector of a car doesn't really support it I guess. You can use it in the projector housing if you've one. In my car Toyota Solara the upper beam does not have a projector so it was kinda messed up. And it was too bright for upcoming traffic that I had to turn it off most of the times.
customer_reviews.author: Lalit Deore

customer_reviews.title: Fits... If you have a grinder!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is very nice. Quality seemed very high until I screwed one into my headlight bucket and it sheered itelf apart. Also. Although they claim they fit my truck. The fan housing is so big the headlights won't fit without cutting away at a piece of plastic behind each headlight bucket.! I made it work but it took a while and some cutting. So... Lights are bright. I like the color. They arnt very strong and they don't fit an 05 Z71 1500. Without some work.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Flanders

customer_reviews.title: LooKs great...Satisfied customer so far...
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on my '04 Chevy Avalanche. I had to notch out the support behind the headlight housing to make room for the cooling fan on the LED bulb. That's a pretty simple task. They work and look great! The reason why I give an overall rating of 4 stars is because of the small amount of fab work involved and I do not know the longevity of the bulb yet. As of now, I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Very bright easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because the previous lights I bought that were neon ballast based, we're horrible. One the light was too scattered two the bulbs had to be connected reverse polarity. After 2 or 3 days the Lights Went Out but came back on I don't know what's up with that but when I took the bulbs out they had brown spots on the inside I immediately return them and bought these I have not had any problem with these lights whatsoever much brighter instant on, stay away from the neon stuff. Installed on a 08 Colorado did not require any additional wiring or flickering nonsense adapters
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: I read a bunch of reviews prior to my purchase. These fit in my 02 Toyota Camry without any modification to the light or car. The quality seems to be on par with other more expensive lights. They are very bright and I’m impressed so far with the difference they make. The key factor now is how long will they last. I’ll try to remember to follow up on this review when they go out to give a representation of longevity. I’ve attached photos to this review to demonstrate how bright they are.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Cougar 9006 LEDs
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased these Cougar Brand LED Bulbs for my 2012 Titan SL 4x4 low beams and after previously purchasing many other brands trying to find something that comes close to the original C9 Cree Bulbs, I must admit that the Cougar brand is by far the best of em all. They fit perfectly snugged in the sockets while the fans are super quiet. The best advantage these bulbs have are their unique lighting patterns and beams. You wont be disappointed with the Cougar Brand LED Bulbs and you'll definitely love the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Can now see both, the Earth as well as the heavens!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the low beams in my 2003 Honda Accord. They're really bright, illuminate a good length of the road in front of me, and have a less bright throw if light going upwards too. So now I can see the cars and signs from a distance. I did not have to cut the notch to make them work with my car, unlike the polarity issues faced with other bulbs. Would highly recommend, specially for the 2003 Honda Accord
customer_reviews.author: Sud

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Cougar Motor for the awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: These LED's fit perfectly in my 2017 RAM 1500. They replaced my HID's that were cheaply made. My HID's had the error code eliminators and they corroded and stopped working after less than 6 months. I will be buying more LED's to swap out my HID headlights in the future. The Cougar Motor LED bulbs are CANBUS plug and play. They came in a very professional made box and the bulbs are just the same very professionally made. Thank you Cougar Motor for the awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Herkey

customer_reviews.title: 2005 Tahoe - 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything about the lifespan yet, but so far these have been great replacements. There is a fan on the backside that takes a bit of space, so on one of the headlights I had to take off the adjustment bracket. No big deal, just a few screws for that one bulb and then put it back together. Very bright and so far I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: An excelllent product and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time, packaged well, with easy to follow instructions. The LED's add a new demension to my night vision. Clearer and brighter than the halogen lights that they replaced. I am 77 years old and need all of the help I can get with my night vision. Thank You Cougar engineers! Michale Orlando
customer_reviews.author: Judi O

customer_reviews.title: 03-07 Chevrolet/GMC pick ups
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my HIDs were a money pit. First off, to my Chevy people, these will only fit the cat eye models if you modify the shroud where your headlight pin goes in. Took me about 20 minutes with a hack saw but the fan part is too big and won’t sit in the recess. Three stars because one of my bulbs is only burning at 50% light and waiting on the seller to contact me. Just as bright as my HIDs but a little better projection.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Willard

customer_reviews.title: Honda Accord 2008 LX
customer_reviews.text: This is no fit for Honda Accord 2008 LX models. HB4 9006 is what my car takes, and this bulbs mentions same descriptions. Yet no fit. One star for misleading information, all the troubles and waste of time. Returning back.
customer_reviews.author: trustMe

customer_reviews.title: COUGAR Best Customer Service and product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased led head light from several companies with light shining all over the street and trees but these Cougar 9006 led give you light where its needed a clear steady beam my wife wants some on her car now.. you can actually see the difference...makes night driving a pleasure..and talk about Warranty this company stands a 100% behind their warranty...I just had to let everyone know I even recommended to my Family and Friends...there might be a little modification involved to install on some vehicles and on others its just about replace light and plug in clip its that easy if unsure call a mechanic
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very white light, but not as bright as I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in a 2006 Cadillac CTS. It has OEM projector-style headlamps that offer a very sharp beam cutoff. The OEM halogens were adjusted too low when I bought the car used, so after installing these I re-aimed the lights. The color quality of these are top notch, but I expected more light quantity from them. Overall they are better than OEM halogens and I hope they are durable since you have to pull the front bumper to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Two_Wheeler_UJM

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the polarities correct. good brightness.
customer_reviews.text: Third Set from Cougar that i have bought for my cars and my family. Great quality for the price. Bright, easy to install, colors match. Have had the cougar brand LED's in the Subaru for 1 yr, the accord for 1/2 a year, and just last night, the minivan. My choice in LED Conversion kits. Coupled with Amazon 1-day shipping. You cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: The difference is like night and day
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 9006 series for my Chevy Tahoe. The difference is like night and day. I've wanted to switch to a 6k color temperature light for awhile now and didn't want HID because of the time it takes them to warm up. These lights are the perfect color, and have no delay in brightness when they are switched on. They were easy to install in my vehicle. Took only 5 minutes from start to finish. (Not everyones will be that easy. It varies from car to car.) I have had such good luck with mine that I ordered a second set in 9005 for the high beams.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Klemm

customer_reviews.title: Company backs their product
customer_reviews.text: Really love theses Led's. Have purchased many Cougar Lighting kits and have always been happy. Had one that died after several months and they promptly sent me a new light and harness. You cannot go wrong with a company that backs their products so well. Vehicles I have installed these on. 2012 Yukon 2005 Suburban 2001 Honda Accord 2007 Honda Civic
customer_reviews.author: 6rockstars

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I installed right away once it was delivered to my house. Boy! it made a huge difference in visibility at night compared to the OEM factory lights. The brand made it relatively easy to install...plug and play as advertised. My son and I had it plugged up within 20 minutes time-span. We've used this brand of LED before on our other truck and that was over a year without any issue. Prior to this, I was using ZXE lights and they keep burning out. ZXE lights actually costed little more than these LED and with short usage time-span. I will continue to buy this brand for our future family vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very bright without blinding others
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to drive with my high beams on a lot I haven't touched the high beams since these have been in. I had been worried that upgraded headlights would get me flashed by other drivers as I have known myself some cars do not get a good beam pattern with these type of headlights and just blind you. These work great on the 03 Toyota Matrix headlight housing. I haven't been flashed and they work really well. One pic shows led bulb on the left with original style bulb on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Hal-9000

customer_reviews.title: Beam pattern is terrible
customer_reviews.text: While the color and brightness of these lights are great, the beam pattern is absolutely terrible. I've gotten flashed by oncoming drivers multiple times due to the glare caused by these lights. Also, they failed to come on this morning and didn't start working until 10 minutes into my drive. I'll be getting a refund shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Modification may be necessary
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright but required extensive modification of headlight assembly to make them fit. If you ar uncomfortable using a dremel don’t use in an older model late 90s early 2000s GM. You have to shave about a half inch from the housing on half the opening to make the low beams fit
customer_reviews.author: RARE Technologies

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 08 Trailblazer. Installation only took about 10 minutes. There is a noticeable difference in brightness with these LED headlights. Much brighter than the halogen bulbs that were in place before. I am very happy with these so far. Only time will tell how the longevity is with these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Carter

customer_reviews.title: Too bright for reflector headlights
customer_reviews.text: Even when I adjust the beam to be as low as possible other cars are often flashing their high beams at me, assuming I have my high beams on when it's just the low beams. They're just too bright, irritating oncoming divers. I just took them out. I want brighter headlights than standard bulbs but this is far too bright. I wish there was some way to adjust the brightness on it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: 3 Year Warranty? Let's See If Cougar Motor Stands Behind The Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of high and low beam as an upgrade on two daily drivers. Worked okay for a couple of months, then started to flicker on the first car and soon after one low beam went out completely. The other car they have started to flicker and have dimmed so much that driving with them has now become too dangerous in inclement weather. Cougar Motor: Please make this right. No way should 2 sets of high and low beam headlights have these problems after only 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Dream Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Upgrade !!
customer_reviews.text: I installed a set of CougarMotor 9006 LED (Low Beam) and 9005 LED (High Beam) in a 2011 Honda Accord. I am amazed at the brightness of these bulbs. Street signs and road markings jump out. Visibility is stunning. Do yourself a favor and search on replacing head light bulbs in your specific vehicle. I was surprised it required removing the front wheels and inner fenders but was well worth the hassle. I highly recommend these bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: TazzD

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Maybe even too bright
customer_reviews.text: These are Very Bright LED Headlights. Very impressed with them so far. I can't speak to longevity because ive only had them 3 months but it is a world of difference between the stock bulbs on any car. I use these on a 2012 Toyota Rav 4. These are as easy to install as the manufacture of Your car makes them. Literally just clips in. On my car it was very easy because toyota made the headlights very accessible. Very Bright Very white lights. If You get these You may need to adjust Your headlights to avoid blinding other drivers.
customer_reviews.author: #FutureLegends

customer_reviews.title: Just as good (maybe better) as HID’s.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with a little skepticism because I had bought LED fog light bulbs before and was very disappointed. After reading the many positive reviews I thought I would give them a try because I once again needed a ballast or bulb for my HID upgrade. The install was very easy (literally plug and play to the factory wiring) and boy was I surprised and impressed!!!.....these bulbs are just as bright and there is no delay/warm up period as with the HID’s, instant on at full brightness. I’ve been using them now for a week and I’m very satisfied, can’t comment on their longevity because of that but so far I’m very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Pasapp

customer_reviews.title: No warranty on amazon purchases
customer_reviews.text: Pins corroded on one of the plugs at the connection to wiring harness and also at the 5 wire box connection. Lightbulb still works but I had to take out and replace with an old bulb. I was unable to get warranty due to buying it from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Beyond stupid if you DON'T order these.
customer_reviews.text: I can not and SERIOUSLY mean can not describe how wonderful these are. I always bought $50-90 headlights from auto stores and was always disappointed and stayed away from LED because it always says "conversation" kit which means I gotta figure out wiring stuff.... NOPE. Plug in. Enjoy beautiful light. Never thought I would want to praise lights on my car so much but called(yes called, not just a text) my grandma and 2 friends to explain how they needed them now. Okay, enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mann

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've had so far
customer_reviews.text: I really like these so far. Nice and bright, but make the high beams next to them look like garbage. Need to get the other set. Install was easy, and they have a rotating bezel of sorts to align it the proper way. That allows easy 90° adjustment if needed. I plan to buy more of these for other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Installed high beams approx. one year ago, still working well. Was difficult to maneuver in tight space on a Dodge Journey so needed a tech to install one bulb should be much easier on a pickup, etc. I don't need to do the low beams, only did the high beams and noticed a significant difference
customer_reviews.author: Steve_S.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 2008 Honda Civic LX. I had my mechanic install the lights. The bumper was not needed to take off to put these on but it would have been easier because it is difficult to install them in with the bumper on. Far as quality of the lights, it is bright. I like them. I didn't have an issue yet but I will update if anything happens. I hope these last. I am a very skeptical person when trying new products from brands that I never heard of or are not known on a large scale but this brand so far is doing good.
customer_reviews.author: Fahad Noor

customer_reviews.title: Much needed upgrade if you drive dark winding roads often!
customer_reviews.text: The canbus decoders that are integrated in these was not compatible with my Sebring, so I had to buy a set of LED capacitor/flicker eliminators for them to work as expected. But once I did that, WOW are they bright. Be prepared for people to flash you because it looks like you have your high beams on! These are single beam lights, use only for high or low beam, if your car has both in one bulb these will not work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Deck

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement over stock bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I installed 9006 low beam LEDs in my 2003 Camry. The installation was very easy. The additional pigtails on bulbs provided more than sufficient length to connect to the car harness. After a week of use I am very impressed with the brightness. My other car has high intensity projector headlights and these are about the same brightness, which is to say a dramatic improvement over the stock incandescent bulbs. I can see about 3X farther and have not had anybody flash their headlights at me thinking I had high beams on.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A Hottman

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service warranty
customer_reviews.text: So I had a light go out and reached out to customer service for a warranty replacement. It's been a week of just back and forth communication because they want me to cut my working light before they issue replacement. They finally agreed to send out replacement but now it's a 6-10 day wait. What a joke!! Will never buy this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are amazingly bright. They are just as bright as my old HID headlights. And so far I haven't had a single problem. They turn on every time unlike my old HID ballasts. No more turning the automatic headlights off and back on to get them to both work after a remote start at night. No flicker. No dark spots. Also they fit perfectly in my jeep wj housing. If I don't write back in a few months, then it was a complete success.
customer_reviews.author: Bri.

customer_reviews.title: So far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I have had them in my 08 Chrysler 300c for about a week now. The light output is perfect and a huge improvement on the halogens that came with the car. The only question now is if they will last. I am very happy so far. I would recommend based upon the limited time i have used them.....
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, last 3 years
customer_reviews.text: They are bright and worked great. I've had them for 3 years now and the left side finally gave out and is super dim. I was hoping for 5 years but I guess 3 isn't so bad. Ordering another set now. Update: the right side completely went out before the new set came in the mail, so I guess 3 years is accurate to expect from these.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: 05 Corolla
customer_reviews.text: Just installed in a 2005 Corolla. Exact 9006 fit. Seems to spread the same as my prior bulbs. About twice as bright. There is a high-frequency flicker only in DRL mode. I contacted the seller and they sent me a pair of decoders, which I had to plug in with the polarity reversed but they got rid of the flicker! UPDATE 9/18/20 One side failed after almost two and a half years, and I ordered another set. Looks like the updated model is more compact. We'll see if this one gets anywhere near the advertised 50,000 hours...
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service ever.
customer_reviews.text: One went out after about 12 hours of use. Contacted company thru Amazon and was told they would only replace the defective bulb if I sent pictures of the wires being cut. Intentionally disabling a key safety system is illegal in my state, so their "fix" required me to break the law. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N Perry

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights and great warranty
customer_reviews.text: If you want bright leds then get these. They are way brighter than my stock bulbs.I see the road better now. Warranty is good for 3 years. I bought these back in 2017.Now is when both leds blew out separately. Contacted seller and replaced them without a problem.Check out photo of my odyssey.Well what are you waiting for get yours today!
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 3rd Week but demonstrated excellent customer service and now working great!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these for my wife. She loved it, much brighter. But only 3 weeks in and one has burned out. I did not read many bad reviews of these so I will try again and update this review. Edit 2/28 : After some excellent customer service work by the manufacturer, I have a new pair of headlamps (a replacement for the bad one and a spare :). I’ve had the new one in for a few weeks and all seems good now. I will update again if I have any problems. If I don’t update, they’re going strong. Did I mention how much brighter these are? They are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: pez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brightness!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these LED replacement lights for my 2002 Chevy Tahoe...I wasn't sure if there'd be a drain on my battery, but it's been a few months now and all is functioning just great. The first night I drove with the new LED lights it was just amazing! The brightness, I was afraid a cop would pull me over...or people coming the other way would flash me thinking I had my brights on...none of that happened! I am truly satisfied with my purchase and would recommend them to my family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: tviloria

customer_reviews.title: Was happy with it at first
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for exactly one month, and suddenly out of nowhere the right headlight just decides to die. I have no clue what happened because nothing in my driving behavior changed throughout the course of owning the LED lights. I took the LED headlight out to examine, but because I'm no expert I cannot find out what's wrong with it. The cables look completely untouched and intact. There does not appear to be any kind of exterior damage to the part, so I am at a loss. I really liked these, and had planned on getting them again for my second car. Unfortunately that will not be the case because I cannot afford to buy LED headlights every month.
customer_reviews.author: Abner

customer_reviews.title: Worked, Easy Install, Basically the same price as 'normal' bulbs
customer_reviews.text: My wife's Honda Odyssey has had headlight issues since day 1. I can't tell you how many times I've replaced the bulbs. This last time, standing in WalMart getting ready to grab yet another couple 9006s, I decided to pull up my Amazon app and see what the LED options might be. These cost a couple bucks more (literally like $2 or $3), were shipped Prime, and installed almost as easily as regular bulbs. I can't attest to how long they'll last, and I can't guarantee that if they don't it's not the stupid Van's fault, but for now they look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: C. Colbert

customer_reviews.title: May not fit due to length of base system.
customer_reviews.text: Had to open up the bulb housing just to fit these bulbs in, they have a huge base system behind the locking prongs. Good color, desent brightness over halogen but not as good as HID. For some reason my passenger side worked fine yet the drivers side had 2 beams coming out, 1 straight ahead and 1 up at a 30° angle. Was worth a try, going back to HID bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Great value upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace my burnt out standard bulbs. They installed fairly easily on my 2003 accord, in certain vehicles it will be easier or harder to reach. The color is consistent between them and it has a mediocre beam pattern but considering the price its great.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Hythier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bulbs worth every penny! High end Build quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome LED bulbs that I have installed for low beam and high beam applications on all of my vehicles. These bulbs are bright and make your car seem like a newer vehicle. Have been using for almost two years without any problems on any of the bulb sets that I have purchased. I have already bought 6 sets for four different vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Z

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are junk! They don’t last long at all not even a year in my case. The customer service is by far the worst I’ve ever dealt with, and they claim to have a 3 year warranty but when you do EVERYTHING they ask for you are they make up a excuse no to replace the bad bulb.
customer_reviews.author: evan

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my car because my friend has led's and theyre great at night time. I work the night shift and drive at night every day. And these are great headlights. Even brighter than my high beams. I will be buying again whenever i need new ones. Hopefully they last long too
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah S.

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent in a while. Grand Prix...read inside
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are amazing. I can actually see the road at night. One major downfall of the Grand Prix GXP has always been headlights. With these bulbs, that is one less issue. Only install issue was the cooling fan unit is too large so the headlight unit didn’t want to go all the way back in. Easy solution, take your hole saw and cut out a circle in the plastic mounting bracket. The resistance is to low to turn the fog light relay on, the company is working with me and is sending me a solution free of charge. Great customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for about 2 years and then one started flashing and then went completely out. They where installed in a 2004 Chevy Silverado had to trim the back headlight mount to fit in place
customer_reviews.author: DOLAN

customer_reviews.title: Get something else.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely inexcusable that the adapter base isn't screwed into place. When twisting the bulb in order to firmly set it in the headlight housing, the adapter base continues to spin. Even if you by chance happen to get the adapter into place.. it is a loose fit and wiggles. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Saleeba

customer_reviews.title: Poor Keying Feature that made them impossible to fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights and they stated they were compatible with 2009 Honda Civic. They had an extra notch/clip that made it impossible to fit. It was not an easy simple fit as stated and overall I did not have a good experience . Save your money and avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Would not install on my 04 Chevy 2500HD
customer_reviews.text: They wouldn't fit in my 04 Chevy 2500HD. They hit the backing plate behind the light assembly. I would have ad to cut a large hole on the backing plate. Also when I set up the return they would only refund part to pay for shipping. What a crock of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: No warranty promise
customer_reviews.text: purchased the pair a few months ago, one stopped working and I contacted them , they had me cut up the malfunctioning light and send a picture which was done. Then I got a reply saying those headlights are not their brand, which doesn't make sense I bought them from them and those are the ones that came in the mail. warranty was voided and not respected. now im buying replacements from ANOTHER seller.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Halogen upgrade for cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of 9005 and 9006 bulbs for my Hi’s and Lows on my 2006 Tahoe. These are very bright and so far I’ve had no problems out of them. As long as I don’t have any problems in the near future I would definitely buy again. At the moment I would recommend to anyone needing a better an upgrade from halogen bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Masted85

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, Bright enough!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 9005 & 9006, Plenty bright when new. Glad I checked the polarity of my sockets. In order to get + to + and - to - had to turn the plug backwards. The latching clip was on the back side. That is why a 4 star instead of 5 star. As for Longevity will have to wait and see. Installed in 2010 Winnebago Motor Home.
customer_reviews.author: RVer Larry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife's car last Christmas. 10 months later, they still amaze me with how bright and clear they are! They were a little hard to install because the heat sync is a lot to fit into a compact space, however, they were worth the effort. Highly recommended! I put these on our 2006 Toyota Avalon. I also used a restoration kit on the headlamp lenses.
customer_reviews.author: olorin

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit OEM 9006 connector
customer_reviews.text: This product may be great, but does not fit in a standard 9006 plug. After removing my existing headlight from my car to double check the connector type, I bought these lights. I quickly found out they did not fit the indicated plug. I returned them and ordered a second pair, assuming a mix up. Once the new pair arrived, I followed the same steps and noticed the connector was the same as the last, and still did not fit. I am returning this second pair and going to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Headlights
customer_reviews.text: Love LOVE these headlights. I can see so much better. 10X better than the factory lights.
customer_reviews.author: GaChubbyBear

customer_reviews.title: May need to take matters in your own hands when it comes to clearance.
customer_reviews.text: The leds are great it’s plug and play...and their very bright. Down side is I cannot fully out my headlight assembly back in place completely because the back of the resistor on the bulb push up against the wall for the headlamp assembly preventing me to put them back all the way. I put the old bulbs back in until I can drill an opening to allow for extra clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT fit 2005 Odyssey, after much trial.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit 2005 Honda Odyssey without a fight, then it didn't light. Switched polarity, still didn't light. There's two sets of tabs - "shave one off!" says the helpful instruction sheet. Hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: The Burgermuffin

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Don't really like rating lights so soon because I don't know about the longevity...installation and brightness...awesome!!...my last ones (different manufacturer, discontinued) lasted for 2 years (50,000 miles)....extreme winter and summer use......hope these last that long
customer_reviews.author: D Max

customer_reviews.title: I was worried on coming traffic would be annoyed and flash me but none did
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! Just what my 1999 Accord needed. Ordered thurs eve and at my door by sat 2pm via Prime. Works as advertised. Took them out this dark wet eve -- you know how a wet night just sort of swallows headlights and they seem woeful. Well, no more dim yellow lighting. I was worried on coming traffic would be annoyed and flash me but none did. Suggest lubing seals with light bulb grease to facilitate the install as I did; silicone lube will work in a pinch. Easy install like an OEM. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely happy with these lights. I purchased this set to switch from HID lights to LED. These lights are just as bright, if not brighter, than HID lights with out the extra heat. People sometimes flash their high beams on me thinking I have my high beams on. They illuminate the whole road in front of me. After about a month of having them on the car, they are holding up really good. We’ll see how long they last
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We just received these and they are super bright, exactly what we wanted! Easy to install! Very glad we bought them, was a little worried about some of the reviews but good purchase. We will write more after we have had them for a while!
customer_reviews.author: RC

product_meta.title: CougarMotor LED Headlight Bulbs All-in-One Conversion Kit - 9006-10000Lm 6000K Cool White CREE
feature_bullets: HIGH POWER: Top CREE LED chips with 60W per pair. Cool White 6000K. High luminous efficacy Flux Up to 10000LM per pair. 200% brighter than your stock Halogen headlights.The latest technology to ensure a perfect beam pattern without any dark spots or foggy light.
AIR COOLING: Whole aluminum housing 7,000 RPM Powerful TurboCool fan to ensures your LED Headlight bulbs Over 50,000 hrs of brilliant continuous light.

EASY INSTALLATION: Can be installed in 20 mins. plug and play. These bulbs are CanBUS-Ready and will work with most vehicle's computer system without error. If you are not sure whether the right, please contact us before purchase.
LONGER LIFE: Last more than 50,000 Hours. Works in any conditions! Rugged housing, fan works even in extreme situations.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: We offer lifetime support.

specifications.Special Features: Cougar Motor Technology 9006 led headlight,Top CREE led chips,Dual Turbo Cooling fan,Plug-N-Play,Street legal,DOT,E-Mark,ROHS,CE,FCC.etc Approved.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,821 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
